title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-8.5 - Customer information

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-8.5 - Customer information

State Regulations
(a) The
addition of sulfiting agents to food by a retailer is prohibited. (b) When foods which have been treated with
sulfiting agents by a manufacturer or grower are being offered for sale at
retail, the customers must be notified by conspicuous, easily readable labels, signs, placards or menu statements at the display location. (c) Customers shall be provided with
information on the correct (sanitary) use of the salad bar. Notes
